item.title: Blogs and Tutorials
item.description: Below are a small collection of blog posts, videos, examples and tutorials that the community have put together. Want your content shared here? Please let us know about it! Blog posts, articles and tutorials Owncast on a free Oracle Cloud computer Oracle has a “Always Free” tier that is capable of running Owncast. tutorial hosting Livestreaming your Wedding with Owncast Here's the recipe I used for my wedding. tutorial example Owncast with podman behind nginx How great it’d be if Owncast replaces all these proprietary streaming services?

item.title: Projects
item.description: The following are examples of projects people have built that either extend or take advantage of Owncast. Want your project shared here? Please let us know about it! Owncast Browser Extension Extension used to follow various Owncast Instances. extension notifications Ownextend A set of OBS/browser compatible tools to extend Owncast. extension chat obs hatbot A basic Owncast chat bot. Very easy to add your own !commands. Written in Python. bot chat Kodi Plugin A plugin for Kodi that lets you browse and watch the Owncast Directory directly from your TV.
